channel.title: I'm Cory and I make things on the web (original, right?)
channel.description:
Hey, everyone!
I'm Cory LaViska and I'm responsible for a few things you may have seen in the wild.
My main focus right now is a SaaS content management system called [Surreal CMS](http://www.surrealcms.com/) which is in its fifth year of operation.
I also maintain [some other free tools](http://www.abeautifulsite.net/services) for web designers/developers as well as a handful of open-source projects on GitHub.
I've been a web developer for over a decade and a founder/bootstrapper since 2007. I recently moved back to my home state of New Hampshire where the tech industry is really starting to blossom. If you're in the greater Boston area, let me know and maybe we can connect at a local meet-up sometime.
It's not often that I join communities like this, but it feels like a good fit and there are a lot of good people around here. I can't wait to "meet" everyone!
— Cory

item.title: I'm Cory and I make things on the web (original, right?)
item.dc:creator: claviska
item.description:
Thanks, Rachel! I love what you and Drew are doing over at Perch. Great little system and seriously awesome branding.

Read full topic
